BR_text.BRsummary: Filter for camera does not work for videos
BR_text.BRdescription:
Current behaviour: The camera filter does not work for videos
 Expected behaviour: It must work.
 Example json files are in internal/meta/testdata

comments_0.comment_text:
Fixed if Exiftool can detect camera make & model:
 <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/301686/95013236-45e0d180-063f-11eb-9bb0-0ed7f9a80521.png></denchmark-link>
 
 Will be deployed for testing with our next Docker image, hopefully later today.

comments_1.comment_text: New Docker images available for testing! Note that the password will be reset to its initial state when upgrading. Our Docker images have been optimized for common NAS models. You can now set a specific user and group using the UID and GID environment variables. Feedback welcome.
